<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Clear default value from model Category for product model table.</description>
        <name>Clear default value from model category</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateDefaultValue('cmdb_model', 'cmdb_model_category', 'Bundle', '');
function updateDefaultValue(table, columnName, currentValue, defaultValue){
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', table);
	gr.addQuery('default_value', currentValue);
	gr.addQuery('element', columnName);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next()){
		gr.setValue('default_value',defaultValue);
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-17 11:58:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>000d4c0873400010c01ce234c4f6a738</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Clear default value from model category</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Model Management" source="com.snc.model">680e780f6d2220100acb70b3534330e5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_000d4c0873400010c01ce234c4f6a738</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-17 12:36:02</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
